reviewText:
Amazing film, starred by two great actors. Winner of Venice Lion ex acquo with Tarkovsky Ivan's childohood 1962. One of the last pictures of the Italian Neo-Realism.

The story turns around two brothers, one of them was picked up by a wealthy man, the other lives a world of dreams.

Mastroianni and Perrin are terrific in this chamber picture.

Don't miss it!!!
